SAMRAI::hier

The Hierarchy Package

The Hierarchy package contains classes that provide basic AMR patch hierarchy definition and management capabilities. Also, base classes for patch data and variables, and variable-data management are found here. These classes are divided into these categories:
  1. index space and box calculus
  2. AMR patch hierarchy structure
  3. AMR patch data and variable support
  4. Distributed layered box-graph data

All class names in the Hierarchy package are in the namespace "hier".
